doc.field: HA in the gardens of Villa La Pietra as a page (with his brother WA) in a wedding photograph at the marriage of Louise Gaylord with Walter Dillingham. Others include Louise's cousin and maid of honour, Italia Blair de Soriano, the best man John Miller, the bridesmaid Margaret Hamill, Louise's mother Bess Adams, [and Guy Mitchell] May
